tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilQualityData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    soil_ph FLOAT,
    moisture_level FLOAT,
    organic_matter_content FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    date_taken DATE,
    ph_level FLOAT,
    nitrogen_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SoilAnalysisResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    ph_level FLOAT,
    nitrogen_level FLOAT,
    organic_matter_content FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
  sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id UUID,
  sample_date DATE,
  pH FLOAT,
  nitrogen_level FLOAT,
  phosphorus_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE soil_quality_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    soil_ph FLOAT,
    nitrogen_level FLOAT,
    phosphorus_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    planting_date TIMESTAMP,
    harvest_date TIMESTAMP,
    yield_per_hectare FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE farming_practices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    fertilizer_used VARCHAR(50),
    irrigation_type VARCHAR(50),
    crop_rotation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE farm_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    soil_condition VARCHAR(50),
    total_area FLOAT
);
